title: 2 Bitcoin ETFs to Avoid—and 1 to Watch in 2026
description: As crypto prices continue to lag, two spot ETFs are charging elevated expense ratios that aren’t justified by their performances, while one offers a bargain.

title: Ozow Announces New Crypto Payments Solution
description: Payment processing provider Ozow has the official integration of cryptocurrency as a primary payment solution on its platform. Powered by MoneyBadger, South Africa’s Bitcoin-centric payments technology provider, this new offering allows customers to pay directly from their crypto wallets, including Bitcoin Lightning and major exchange wallets such as Luno, VALR, and Binance, with instant settlement […]

title: Trump’s Pick for Fed Chair Points to Growing Bitcoin-Dollar Synthesis
description: Warsh's hawkish stance on Fed policy may have disappointed the crypto world, but he said Bitcoin was effectively gold for anyone under the age of 40.
